text: The Garage () is a 1980 Russian comedy movie directed by Eldar Ryazanov and starring Liya Akhedzhakova, Iya Savvina, Svetlana Nemolyayeva, Valentin Gaft, Andrey Myagkov, Georgi Burkov, Leonid Markov, Igor Kostolevsky, Anastasia Voznesenskaya. It was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 comedy movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Eldar Ryazanov Category:Movies set in Russia
title: The Garage (1980 movie)
